overview:
Roger Sievers is a multi-platform designer that innovates and creates things for web, print, video, and interactive mediums.

Roger is the founder of Mind Blossom Creations. A local company serving the creative needs of local businesses in the southern Twin Cities suburbs and surounding areas. Mind Blossom Creations was created out of the need to offer Effective and Professional Web site development for small and medium sized businesses at a reasonable cost.

Each and every day our communities grow more and more connected, as we continue to advance the ways we use the internet. With the internet so concretely woven into the fabric of our everyday lives, so many people are finding or purchasing their goods and services online. It is important that every business can find an affordable and professional solution to build their presence on the web. This will ensure that our local marketplace can conform to and meet the demands of tomorrow’s consumers.

Mind Blossom Creations is a local company that works to ensure that there is a Web site package to fit the budget of every company.
